mapper.insert: INSERT INTO email_verification ( email, email_send_cd, email_ftime, email_reg_date ) VALUES ( #{email}, #{emailSendCd}, #{emailFtime}, #{emailRegDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT email, email_send_cd AS emailSendCd, email_ftime AS emailFtime, email_reg_date AS emailRegDate FROM email_verification WHERE email = #{email}
